main event: A bright silver object, shaped like a star, was sighted spinning and then disappearing instantaneously by multiple observers in a ground-radar sighting.
interesting points: Several ground observers mentioned to the primary observer that the object was an airplane.
The sighting was made by a civilian observer using binoculars.
sighted object: a bright silver object shaped like a star
location: 13 miles west of Montauk, New York
